channel.title: JQuery Termina Emulator Plugin
channel.description: Notifications for JQuery Terminal Emulator Plugin.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version 0.6
item.description: New version of jQuery Terminal Emulator.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version 0.5
item.description: New version of jQuery Terminal Emulator with few new featues.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version 0.4.5
item.description: New version of jQuery Terminal Emulator that fix lines wrapping when text contain tabs characters.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version 0.4
item.description: New version of jQuery Terminal Emulator that fix text formating when formatting contain newlines.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version 0.4
item.description: New version of jQuery Terminal Emulator that fix text formating when text in more then one line. Tab completion and nested objects as first argument.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version 0.3.8
item.description: New version of jQuery Terminal Emulator that fix cursor movement when command contain new lines (if you copy/past the text that contain them)

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version 0.3.5
item.description: New version of jQuery Terminal Emulator that fix scrolling in jQuery 1.6

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New example "Star Wars ASCIIMation"
item.description: New example showing ASCII animation "Star Wars ASCIIMation" on JQuery Terminal (animation by Simon Jansen from http://www.asciimation.co.nz/).

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version with fixes with new page
item.description: You can now download version 0.3.1 from github or from page. Web page is redesigned. New API is documented.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: Final 0.3 Release on github
item.description: You can now download version 0.3 from github. Fix Resizing and refreashing, long command lines. Support for basic text formating, and allow passing function to echo method, ASCII-ART signature which change depending on size of terminal. Callbacks for Keypress, Keydown that alow to overwrite default keystrokes. Modifications of API (undocumented)

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: Version 0.3-RC1 on github
item.description: You can now download latest version from github: https://github.com/jcubic/jquery.terminal

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: version 0.2.3.9
item.description: Fix adding enter (0x0D) to the command

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: version 0.2.3.8
item.description: update mousewheel plugin which fix scrolling in Opera

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: version 0.2.3.6
item.description: Fix json-serialization in IE and position fixed in tilda plugin IE.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: version 0.2.3.5
item.description: Fix demos and transparency for clipboard textarea in IE.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: Fix download problem
item.description: There was a typo in zip filename and server compress compressed tar.gz file. You can now download the plugin.

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: Version 0.2.3.4
item.description: fix long lines in command line issue

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: Version 0.2.3.3
item.description: fix Termial in Internet Explorer

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: Small Bug Fixes - (version 0.2.3.2)
item.description: Fix blank line issue (thanks to Chris Janicki for finding the bug), fix CTRL + Arrows and scroll on CTRL+V

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version of Terminal - 0.2.3.1
item.description: There is new verision of JQuery Terminal plugin 0.2.3.1 - allow CTRL+W and CTRL+T

item.author: jcubic[at]onet[dot]pl
item.title: New version of Terminal - 0.2.3
item.description: There is new verision of JQuery Terminal plugin 0.2.3 - fix for "#$%.{" characters on Opera/Chrome, add cursor move with CTRL+P, CTRL+N, CTRL+F, CTRL+B which also work on Chrome. Fix Arrow Keys on Chrome (for cursor move and command line history). Change License to LGPL3
